title: Create user registration function with email validation
description:
1. Create file tasks/auth.py
2. Add function register_user(email, password) that validates email format using regex
3. Return dict with 'success': True/False and 'message' explaining result
4. Email must contain @ and valid domain format
5. Password must be at least 8 characters
acceptanceCriteria: Function exists, validates email format, rejects invalid emails, accepts valid emails with proper passwords, returns dict with success/message keys
contextNotes: Other functions in codebase are simple and focused. Follow pattern of returning clear results. Use simple regex for email validation.
